name: Sounds of the Forest
description:
A short audio focused game made for BlindJam. Headphones are required.

This is an Alpha version their will be issues. Also had to rush it due to limited time available to work on it (Hence this bare bones page).

How to Play

  • Follow the Guide.
  • Stay on the Path.
  • Avoid the Invisible Creatures.
  • Escape the Forest.

Consider playing with eyes closed or blind folded as the goal was to make it playable with audio only.

If you're having trouble, check the bottom of the readme.

Controls

WASD: Movement
Mouse: Look
QE: Alternate Look

Space: Restart
Escape: Return to Menu

64bit Windows only.

Features SteamAudio for HRTF.

Note the game is not yet fully blind accessible. While it can be played blind, the menu's lack an audio guide. If you are blind and wish to play, here is the procedure: On launching exe wait a few seconds for splash screen to end, press space to play (you should hear sound now). All sound will cease if you die or win (If a creature got close you died) press space to replay or escape to to return to menu. Press escape to exit from menu.

Sorry I didn't have time to add proper accessibility.
